alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Georgetown; Marion; Marlboro; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 4:59PM EST until January 09 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Western Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... Darlington County in northeastern South Carolina... Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Marlboro County in northeastern South Carolina... Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 600 PM EST. * At 457 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Hamlet to near Gourdin, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management reported many trees down around Darlington. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Bennettsville, Hartsville, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Darlington, Mullins, Red Springs, Kingstree, Pembroke, Andrews, Maxton, Timmonsville, Mccoll, Johnsonville, Latta, Pamplico, Rowland, and Lamar. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for northeastern South Carolina. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Georgetown; Marion; Marlboro; Williamsburg
